content: n2 picking up the wrapped sts as you go heel flap work sts on n1 heel flap is now worked back and forth on n2 sts row 1 rs picking up any wrapped sts as you go k39 46 52 ssk turn row 2 ws sl1 p26 30 34 p2tog turn row 3 rs sl1 *k1 sl1 repeat from * 13 15 17 times ssk turn repeat row 2 and 3 until all heel sts have been worked n2 now holds 28 32 36 sts st count total of 56 64 72 leg go back to working in the round if you have slight gaps where the heel flap meets the leg of the sock pick up one extra st in that gap and decrease it out on the next round continue working st st until leg is 5-7 long try on as you go to determine what length you like **yarn amounts given are for a boot length leg or approx 6-8 for a significantly longer sock leg you may need more yarn** cuff finish sock with 1 inch of ribbing options 1x1 rib k1 p1 repeated to end 2x2 rib k2 p2 repeated to end 3x1 rib k3 p1 repeat to end bobble using a stretchy method contact info mom knitter and designer living in the carlie perrins pacific north west perpetually hoping for carlieperrinsknits@outlook com snow i love all things yarn making and https //www ravelry com/people/carliecn cozy i hope you enjoy my pattern © carlie perrins 2019
